Html:
Hi friends,

using svg rendering engine how to convert an exsisting svg image to a jpeg or png.

Thanks in advance

Kiran

Hi,

This should really be in the documentation, eh!

var sampleDoc = SvgDocument.Open(@"C:\sample.svg");
sampleDoc.Draw().Save(@"C:\sample.png");

There shouldn't be much more to it than that.

Scriv
